titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for an anniversary thanksgiving, in commemoration of his Majesties happy birth-day, being the fourteenth day of October, &c.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701. aut
Scotland. Privy Council. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the Heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to His most Sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Edinburgh, the sixteenth day of September, 1685. Will. Paterson. Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Identified film as Wing S1424 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
